svg.text: • Code Quality: 95%+ test coverage, zero critical vulnerabilities, comprehensive documentation
• Performance: 60 FPS compliance, <16.67ms frame budgets, memory leak prevention, load testing to 10x capacity
• Reliability: 99.9% uptime target, automated recovery, graceful degradation, comprehensive error handling
• Security: Penetration testing, dependency scanning, static analysis, compliance validation (GDPR/CCPA)
